Name: Pixel Gangsters: Mafia Manager
About the game: • BUILD your mafia EMPIRE • RECRUIT loyal mobsters and CREATE your gang • UPGRADE your gangsters with WEAPONS and VEHICLES • PLAN ROBBERIES, HEISTS and ASSASSINATIONS • EXTORT businesses and collect PROTECTION fees • BUY properties and manage illegal RACKETS • INTERROGATE rival mobsters and SPY in their territories • BRIBE city officials, such as the MAYOR and POLICE CHIEF • BAIL yourself out of LAWSUITS • ELIMINATE your RIVALS and take over the city • RANDOMLY generated cities for limitless REPLAYABILITY • RETRO PIXEL graphics (true 320x180 resolution)
